Review_Text: Imagine complaining about dubbing when theres a sub option. Havent even finished the series yet, just offsetting the negative score bc people are too lazy to find out what viewing options are available to them.

Review_title: Light and fun...almost an ad for asian cities
Review_Text: First, other reviewers learn how to use Netflix. You can choose the language for both audio and subtitles. So you can just select Original audio and you get it in Japanese.A fun, light, entertaining look at various Asian nightlife. Watch it when you want some easy entertainment and imagine visiting these cities.
Can you just let people talk in their languages? Why dub over with English? Extremely unnecessary and irritating. Why can't you give people an option to hear the people's real voice?

What a great perspective from the people of the nighttime Tokyo. It was very inspiring seeing people being themselves and enjoying one another without the conflict, angst, and skepticism we have to deal with in the US. Music was nice too.
The voiceover takes all emotion and energy out of the situations we are seeing. There are some cool visuals but couldn't make it through the first episode. Would have preferred subtitles.
